title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.19 - Engineering service and equipment areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.19 - Engineering service and equipment areas

State Regulations

Engineering service and equipment areas shall include
and comply with the following: (a) Equipment room(s), which shall consist of room(s) or separate building(s) for
boilers, mechanical equipment and electrical equipment; (b) engineers' quarters providing office or
suitable desk space for engineer; (c) maintenance shop(s); (d) storage room(s) for building maintenance
supplies which may be part of maintenance shop in nursing homes of less than
100 residents; and
(e) yard
equipment storage, which shall consist of a separate room or building for yard
maintenance equipment and supplies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
713-3.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
